name: Skeeter
summary:
Save yourself from the swarm of skeeters rising up from the deserted wastelands! Use power-ups to survive as long as you can! Achievements and high scores await.
Tap each skeeter as they fly on screen. If they land they will start to drain your life. The longer you last the more skeeters will find you.
Use multi-touch to fend off the hordes and collect power-ups. Once you have a power-up in your dashboard tap it to unleash its power.
